name: Paint The Walls Red (GMTK 2018)
description:
<An Action / Arcade game, but everytime you attack your attack changes>

With hordes of the dead returned invading your castle, you know your end is near.

Luckily you also have your sword, and is determined to take some of em with you.

Includes lots of blood, to give your walls a fleeting new coat of paint. And some really bad music.

Made for the GMTK Jam 2018
